availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
West Liberty Ky. February 8. 1863.
Dear Alex

I Enclose you Certificate of Election Mr. James P. Harris U S Judge of Floyd County Courts You are aware that there has been no mail for some time from Floyd County to the Seat of Government, which has prevented Mr Harris from obtaining his Commission You will please obtain the Commission and bring it up to me when the Session closes if Mr D Shall have left Frankfort and the Secretary received this he will please enclose this ^the commission^ to Mr N P Reid at Owingsville Ky. who will send it to me

Floyd Co.
Jas P. Harris
Co. Judge
Issd Feby 13. 1863
